title: Le Chant du Monde
creator_credit: Orphee Productions, Films Marceau, Liber Films, Claire Duval, Michel Choquet and Marcel Camus
brief_description: In Haute-Provence, two rival clans are in constant battle against one another. In the midst of this conflict, a passionate love affair unfolds. Stars Catherine Deneuve, Hardy Kruger, Charles Vanel. Based on a novel by Jean Giono.
